author: bsunanda
body:
#### PR description:

Modify all Run3 geometry scenarios by including demonstration chambers of GE21 & RPC, and detectors in forward region (BHM, PLT, BCMF) plus removing BSC

#### PR validation:

Use the runTheMatrix test workflows 

#### if this PR is a backport please specify the original PR and why you need to backport that PR:

If successful, it needs to be back ported to 12_2_X
title: Run3 gex108 Modify all Run3 geometry scenarios by including demonstration chambers of GE21 & RPC, and detectors in forward region (BHM, PLT, BCMF) plus removing BSC
